resources.string: All of your contacts have been removed from your phone.
100 randomly generated contacts have been added to your phone.
100 \'zeroed\' contacts have been added to overwrite memory on your phone.
In The Clear Data Wipe Settings
Wiping selected data from your phone...
Please setup preferences first to enter your alert information.
Your phone will continue to Panic! every 45 seconds until you cancel this process...
This utility will display the SSL certificate information for any HTTPS enabled website.
You must enter an https:// site address
What language should In The Clear display?
Enter the mobile phone number(s), separated by comma, of who you want to alert via SMS
Enter your name to be displayed to configured friends.
Wipe all images and video from your Media Gallery.
Select the folders on your SD card that will be wiped when you press the PANIC! button
Check this if you DO NOT want confirmation before executing Panic! Otherwise, you will have to confirm before Panic! executes.
We couldn\'t access your settings. Please check your preferences.
There was a problem saving your preferences.
You do not have any friends configured. Please check your preferences.
Enter the message you want to shout to your configured friends.
WARNING: THIS WILL REMOVE THE ACTUAL DATA FROM YOUR PHONE.\n\nSelect one or more data types below to wipe.
You have selected folders on your SD Card to be wiped.
You have not selected any folders, or have disabled folder wiping, so nothing on your SD Card will be wiped
Your call log has been wiped!
All SMS messages have been wiped!

InTheClear is a mobile app designed to help improve your safety in difficult situations. It does this with three main features that you must configure.

Panic!, Shout & Wipe

This wizard will walk you through the setup process for these features, and ensure your mobile is ready for an emergency situation.

string-array.name: WIZARD_TEXT
string-array.item: In The Clear helps keep you safer in difficult situations by sending emergency SMS messages and wiping data off your phone at your command.\n\nThis one-time wizard will help you set up your phone to work properly in an emergency situation.

In The Clear sends emergency SMSes to your choice of recipients(s). To make sure we will be able to send an emergency SMS, first send a test message to yourself. Just enter your mobile phone number below and select Send.
Now that we\'ve tested Emergency SMS, we will personalize your actual message and recipients. To send to multiple recipients, separate phone numbers with commas.
In The Clear can wipe data off your phone\'s memory when you activate it. Select what data you want to erase below

One-Touch Panic is a feature of In The Clear that activates Emergency SMS and Data Wipe. To avoid accidental usage, the default setting requires you to confirm activation once you start One-Touch Panic. You can remove this prompt with the setting below.
Would you like to create a custom shortcut for One-Touch Panic? This makes it even easier to send emergency SMSes and wipe your phone memory should you encounter a difficult situation.
Thanks for setting up In The Clear. Remember that you can activate its features manually from within the app, or run them right away using One-Touch Panic shortcuts.

resources.string:
In The Clear emergency SMSes are sent just like any other SMS. Possible reasons for failure include:

Bad wireless reception
No airtime or credit
Missing or damaged SIM card

If you've checked all of the above and the test SMS is still not sending, In The Clear may not be supported on your handset. Please email us at:
It seems like your message went through. Please check with the recipient to make sure.
It looks like your test SMS was NOT sent successfully.\nView details for more info.
This is the location data we could access:
This phone number doesn\'t appear valid. Please try another number.
Be careful! You won\'t be able to recover the data once it\'s wiped.
When One-Touch Panic is activated, confirm before running.
Yes, create a homescreen shortcut for One-Touch Panic.
We were unable to access any phone location data.
Great! Seems like we can access your local data.
Check this if you DO NOT want confirmation before executing Panic! Otherwise, you will have to confirm before Panic! executes.
This is a test message. Reply if you get it!
